designData.title: Subscribe & get started
designData.name: Subscribe
designData.caption: Submit as many design tasks as you need without worrying about individual project fees.

designData.title: Polished designs - on time
designData.name: Polished designs
designData.caption: Our designers get to work to deliver your request. Receive your design within a few days.

designData.title: Revisions made simple
designData.name: Polished designs
designData.caption: Custom designs, prompt replies and as many revisions as you need.

capabilitiesCards.title: 1. On-demand requests
capabilitiesCards.description: Put all your requests in the design queue in Trello, and we'll knock them out 1 by 1.

capabilitiesCards.title: 2. Top-notch quality
capabilitiesCards.description: High-end work from a dedicated team of senior designers that's always available when you need it.

capabilitiesCards.title: 3. Powered by - Webflow
capabilitiesCards.description: We build every site on Webflow, making them dynamic, accessible, and easily scalable. It's easy for you like Squarespace but better.

capabilitiesCards.title: 4. Fast. Responsive. Reliable.
capabilitiesCards.description: Get regular updates on your projects and can expect to receive your designs within 2-3 days.

capabilitiesCards.title: 5. No Lock in contracts
capabilitiesCards.description: Pay the same every month, no surprises. You can use it for as long as you want and cancel anytime.

capabilitiesCards.title: 6. Great value for money
capabilitiesCards.description: Get the power of dedicated design team at fraction of the cost of full-time employee. ($54k/yr vs. $112k/yr).

capabilitiesCards.title: 7. Customized for you
capabilitiesCards.description: We design and build custom for you. We're never starting from a template unless you want that? You don't, right?

capabilitiesCards.title: 8. Creative paying
capabilitiesCards.description: We're here when you need us and not on payroll when you don't.

capabilitiesCards.title: 9. Expert turnovers
capabilitiesCards.description: You're getting 10+ years of design experience with every request. No hand-holding required.

pricingCards.title: Standard
pricingCards.description: One request at a time. For companies who need on-going design support.

pricingCards.title: Growth
pricingCards.description: Double the requests. For companies with increasing design needs. Limited spots.

pricingCards.title: Basic - Weekly
pricingCards.description: Perfect if you want to try the subscription out or only have a few one-off tasks.
